metadata.title: CVE-2024-38229 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Kestrel http/3 - When closing an HTTP/3 stream while application code iswriting to the response body, a race condition may lead to remote codeexecution.

criterions.comment: dotnet8 package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
